Articles.Content: I dont even know how.

found it. easily. not spoiling it tho
The point is not finding. The point is simply... HOW?! Is it really that big?!
I've looked at it many times, and reconized it! It's pretty simple
Wow, you can see that from that high up o_O

I crashed around there a year ago... And walked to it after that...

Its a nice place to go, maybe i should visit that place again you know, by the kerbal way.
What's the black fairing?

What's the black fairing?

Kw rocketry, those are new 5m wide parts. Im hiding my apollo style lander from the kraken in there.
Found that in half a second.
If I'm right, that thing is 2 pixels on my screen >.<

Ow! Alright alright!
About that beautiful screenshot, yes. I don't know who would hit you for saying that.

Edit:

Oh do you mean the smiley made with craters?

The point is not finding. The point is simply... HOW?! Is it really that big?!
Pretty much. Many of the easter eggs are large compared to Kerbals and typical ships. I think it's partly to make them possible to see from further away, and partly because big things are more impressive.
Ah, it's my old arch-nemesis...

Hmmm, Mun, modded craft, texture seam, arch....

Nope, can't see the Easter egg at all :/

Edit:

Oh do you mean the smiley made with craters?

Hmm... Oh, I see it now! So hard to see that smiley face...
Found it almost instantly. Perhaps if the lighting was at a different angle, it would've been harder to spot.

I can't tell if this is a real question or not - it's that time of night/morning when I'm thinking-impared again.

Just on the off-chance that someone doesn't know what we're talking about:

Look at where the nosecone meets the body of the rocket. Look down the picture from there to the crater below the rocket. Towards the bottom edge of that crater is

A FRIGGIN HUGE MUN-ARCH!

(Trust me, when you get there you'll find out just how big it is)

The point is not finding. The point is simply... HOW?! Is it really that big?!

could be. Without the exact altitude I can't say for certain.

That said it's less a matter of size and more that the arch is rendering at a further range. It would make it easier to spot.
Spotted it. In a vanilla playthrough while decending. I had a Rover and thought I went down near it. Took me like almost an RL hour to get there from the landing zone, lol.
I think i will recreate the world cup addon trailer!
